item.title: Log in to Microsoft Entra ID without active subscription from Azure CLI
item.description: In this post we take a look at how you can log in to an Microsoft Entra ID without active subscription from Azure CLI.

item.title: Power of --query in Azure CLI
item.description: Let's take a look at how helpful query parameter can be in Azure CLI.
